chapter.title: Authors
chapter.para: The Anjuta project was founded by Naba Kumar. This page lists all Anjuta contributors.

For more information on Anjuta, please visit the project website at http://anjuta.org. Bug reports should be made using the Bug Tracker at the project development site
http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/anjuta.

This manual was written by Naba Kumar, Andy Piper, Biswapesh Chattopadhyay and Johannes Schmid. Please send all comments and suggestions regarding this manual to the Anjuta Devel list anjuta-devel@list.sourceforge.net. Comments may also be submitted via the project trackers at SourceForge.
